gameLoader

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameLoader.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    A level holds all the data pertaining to the current game state: configuration of the rooms, tiles, and exits, location of items, and characters timer value
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Group D, Main Author: Trang Pham Group D Members --------------- Karen Madore Trang Pham Darrell Penner
